'''Snaggleroot''' was an [[Ents|Ent]] who appeared alongside the [[Entwives|Entwife]] [[Winterbloom]]. He was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' television series by [[Amazon Studios]], where he appeared in the second season of the show. He is voiced by Jim Broadbent.
